Itemized Passive Description:
*When the Finish Effect is not activated*
- Unable to attack
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +3
- ATK & DEF 259%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Guards all attacks
- Changes Ki Spheres: INT to PHY
- Receives an additional Ki +2 per PHY Ki Sphere obtained
- Receives an additional Ki +1 per Type Ki Sphere obtained
(PHY excluded)
*When receiving an attack*
- DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} for every 3 Ki
- Damage reduction rate 59%{passiveImg:up_g} when Ki is 24
*For every Ki Sphere obtained*
- DEF 20%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every PHY Ki Sphere obtained*
- All allies' DEF 7%{passiveImg:up_g} for 2 turn(s)
*When the Finish Effect is activated*
- ATK 100%{passiveImg:up_g}

per charge count and causes 
ultimate damage to enemy
